trans-unit.source: Represents an object that identifies an item of content.
trans-unit.target: 代表物件，識別內容項目。

trans-unit.source: Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 ContentLocatorBase，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>識別資料項目的已排序清單透過<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>

trans-unit.source: Derived from ContentLocatorBase, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 ContentLocatorBase，<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>識別透過一組資料項目<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator>項目。</xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改深層複本這個<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 方法會建立可修改此複本會將複製的已凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, Clone shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，複製會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.` When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
trans-unit.target: 複製<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>屬性會是`false`即使這個來源<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>的<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A>屬性是`true.`當複製相依性屬性時，複製會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （雖然它們可能不能再解析），但不會複製動畫或是目前的動畫值。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable deep copy clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 可修改深層複本複製這個<xref href="System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase"> </xref>。
